item.title: Christy add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Christy add a quote by Geoffrey Chaucer
item.description: "The lyf so short, the craft so long to lerne." -- Geoffrey Chaucer

item.title: Christy add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "I'm having a magenta day. Not just red, but magenta!" -- Stephen King

item.title: Christy add a quote by Alexander Pope
item.description: "What Reason weaves, by Passion is undone." -- Alexander Pope

item.title: Christy add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description:
"Then is courtesy a turncoat. But it is certain I am loved of all ladies, only you excepted: and I would I could find in my heart that I had not a hard heart; for, truly, I love none.
Beatrice: A dear happiness to women: they would else have been troubled with a pernicious suitor. I thank God and my cold blood, I am of your humour for that: I had rather hear my dog bark at a crow than a man swear he loves me. -Much Ado About Nothing" -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Christy add a quote by Claude Monet
item.description: "My garden is my most beautiful masterpiece" -- Claude Monet
